thread.title: Ranveer Singh Has Dreadlocks Now, To Prove That He Gives Not A Single Damn
thread.title_full: Ranveer Singh Has Dreadlocks Now, To Prove That He Gives Not A Single Damn

title: Ranveer Singh Has Dreadlocks Now, To Prove That He Gives Not A Single Damn
text:
facebook 497 SHARES 
Ranveer Singh is the legit wild child of Bollywood, emerging in the most unexpected silhouettes one after another and keeping his fans positively shocked. After debuting the condom brand Durex’s one-of-a-kind jeans and, resultantly, raising a mini storm on Twitter, the actor is out with his new eyebrow-rasing antic. This time, it’s him sporting dreadlocks for the clothing brand Jack & Jones, India. — Ranveer Singh (@RanveerOfficial) March 30, 2017 
Doing a flawless job of channelling his inner Khal Drogo (from Game Of Thrones), Ranveer has been photographed giving a fierce face – with dramatic eyes in tow, of course – wearing a razor sharp suit. Finishing this mucho macho look is a head full of dreadlocks. For anyone who thought that they’d seen it all when it came to Ranveer Singh, well, here’s the brave heart compelling you to eat your words.
